title: About futur event possibility for the order and chaos event
body:
plz Riot do us an event like the darkstar singularity or blodmoon were but a order and chaos vertion were we can get tokens and stuff .
The victory emblem was exclusif to the skin realies event but the rest doesn't have to be ! plus it was supper cool .
plz do , 
with love , 7ER0KILL !!

replies.body: That's a pretty good idea! We're still working on more missions and how they'll work in the future, but you're more than welcome to post this idea over in [**Concepts and Creations**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) to draw a little more attention to it!
